oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup Rehearsal - 1946-09-20 - KOMA - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part two of a rehearsal from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on September 20, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Lem Hawkins; Homegrown Trio; Hiram Higsby; Ann Bond; Mary Lou; Chuck Davis
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Lem Hawking and Hiram Higsby tell a joke [incomplete] / (1:47) Lem Hawkins performs "[Unidentified banjo tune]" / (3:05) Hiram Higsby introduces the next song / (3:14) The Homegrown Trio performs "Look Down That Lonesome Road" / (5:39) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (6:14) Lem Hawkins and Hiram Higsby perform "Cement Mixer" / (8:12) Hiram Higsby and Ann Bond tell a joke / (8:57) Ann Bond performs "I’m Going To Build A Big Fence Around Texas" / (10:56) Hiram Higsby introduces the next song / (11:01) Mary Lou and the Homegrown Trio performs "In The Garden" / (12:41) Chuck Davis performs the closing theme / (14:06) Closing statements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975; Bond, Ann; Davis, Chuck;
